scripts.deploy_dev: ssh -t -i _deploy/goingsunny-oregon.pem centos@35.162.241.129 'cd prod/gsun-datacenter && git pull && pm2 startOrRestart pm2.json --env development'
scripts.deploy_dev_hard: ssh -t -i _deploy/goingsunny-oregon.pem centos@35.162.241.129 'cd prod/gsun-datacenter && git pull && npm install && pm2 startOrRestart pm2.json --env development'
scripts.deploy_prod: ssh -t -i _deploy/goingsunny-oregon.pem centos@35.162.241.129 'cd prod/gsun-datacenter && git pull && npm run build && pm2 startOrRestart pm2.json --env production'
